attributes.action: We call on the government to reverse the dramatic decline in police officers
attributes.additional_details: We live in a time where you are scared to leave your home at night, walk your dog or even go to bed for an early night without the fear of someone breaking in and stealing what you work so hard for. There is absolutely no consequence to the offender. People are becoming vigilante and taking the law into their own hands, as criminals are arrested and released back into our areas to start their crime wave again and again . We cant keep feeling like this because you feel you need to save pennies.
attributes.background: The decline in the number of police officers  available to protect the public . We call on you as the government to return our forces to pre austerity levels, Which will allow the police to return law and order to our towns and cities.
